item.author: blog@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: Hi! My name is Pietro F. Maggi. I’m a father an husband and occasionally I find the time to write some code. I really believe that the best way to learn how something works is to take it apart (I know, I can’t really blame my kids when they do the same). I’ve more than fifteen years designing and developing software solutions with a deep mobile experience. I sometimes speak at conferences about the Android developer tools and libraries.

item.title: Public talks
item.author: blog@pietromaggi.com (Pietro F. Maggi)
item.description: Android at Large - video from Android Developer Summit 2019 With Android making its way to new form factors, and OEM’s pushing the boundaries with new technology, it’s time to take a look at what these environments bring to you and your users. It’s crucial that your developer workflow accounts for resizability, new display sizes and aspect ratios, multi display, and app continuity to provide your users the best experience no matter where they are.
